actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the existing dollar limitation on the total amount of the Federal payments which may be made to Puerto Rico in any fiscal year under the medicaid program.

summary.text: Amends part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act to increase the total amount of Federal payments which may be made to Puerto Rico under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the existing dollar limitation on the total amount of the Federal payments which may be made to Puerto Rico in any fiscal year under the medicaid program.
